welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cumru, United States! Known for its charming small-town atmosphere and beautiful nature, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and charter flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lancaster Airport serves both commercial and general aviation flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lancaster Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
